function: Design database schema to support service listings, bookings, user inquiries, and service statuses.

Enum type for booking status. Indexes on frequently queried columns (email, service_id, scheduled_date). UUID primary keys for all records.

interaction_and_states.description: SQL migration scripts create tables with defined schemas, constraints, and indexes when application starts. Existing data preserved during updates.
INSERT operations for new services, bookings, inquiries. UPDATE operations for booking status changes. SELECT queries with JOINs for related data retrieval.
